snippet: The Hurricanes squandered a 16-point lead but hung on in overtime for their first victory at Cameron Indoor Stadium.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Miami defeats Duke, 78-74, in overtime; other men's and women's college basketball results noted.
lead_paragraph: The Hurricanes squandered a 16-point lead but hung on in overtime for their first victory at Cameron Indoor Stadium.

headline.seo: College Basketball — Miami Upsets Duke on the Road in OT
headline.main: Miami Catches Duke Asleep in a Stunning Road Upset
headline.print_headline: Miami Catches Duke Asleep In a Stunning Road Upset
